content: Yeah. I don’t think I get it. I’m here to read things, write things, and maybe make some contacts with people who make my life better. If something pisses me off or feels “off”, I (metaphorically) walk away unless I feel there’s something so important to say it’s worth the potential backlash. Like…I didn’t want to write this because I’m slightly afraid of backlash, but this place has become too important for me to not address it. I’m feeling super frustrated and sad.
